Promo
Events
Live Latin Music Events
We energize the city’s nightlife with live latin music every weekend night and during special events. From salsa and reggaeton to bachata and merengue, our vibrant performances illuminate the Miami entertainment scene. Our venue becomes a lively gathering place where guests can savor authentic
Latin cuisine
while enjoying performances by talented musicians who embody the essence of Latin culture.
JR & ROSE
Event Description:
Enjoy your evening with the sensational Latin music duo, JR & Rose, at Pilón Miami. This talented pair brings a unique blend of soulful melodies and rhythmic beats.
Event Date:
July 26, 2025
Event Time:
9:00 PM
Price Per Person:
No Cover Charge
Reservation
los Pascual
Event  Description:
Celebrate Dad with an evening of live music featuring the energetic sounds of
Los Pascual
. Enjoy flavorful Latin fusion cuisine, handcrafted cocktails, and the vibrant atmosphere that makes
Pilón Miami
the perfect place to celebrate.
Date:
June 14, 2025
Time:
9:30 pm
Price Per Person:
No Cover Change
Reservation
Robin Espejo
Event Description:
Feel the
dynamic energy
of
Robin Espejo
live at
Pilón Miami
. With his powerful voice and infectious Latin rhythms, Robin delivers a performance full of passion and flair. Join us for a night of great music, delicious Latin fusion cuisine, and an atmosphere you won’t forget.
Event Date:
June 28, 2025
Event Time:
9:00 PM
Price Per Person:
No Cover Charge
Reservation
Paula Zuleta
Event Description:
Join us at
Pilón Miami
for an unforgettable evening with the talented
Paula Zuleta
. Known for her powerful vocals and dynamic stage presence, Paula brings the essence of Latin music to life with every performance. Enjoy a night filled with vibrant rhythms, flavorful Latin fusion cuisine, and amazing cocktails. Don’t miss this special night of live entertainment!
Event Date:
July 04, 2025
Event Time:
9:00 PM
Price Per Person:
No Cover Charge
Reservation
Jose Luis
Event  Description:
A special celebration of
Colombian Independence
at
Pilón Miami
, featuring the vibrant voice of
José Luis Carrascal
. Known for his powerful vocals and passion for traditional Colombian music. Enjoy handcrafted cocktails and Latin fusion dishes as you experience an unforgettable night of culture, music, and celebration.
Date:
July 19, 2025
Time:
9:30 pm
Price Per Person:
No Cover Change
Reservation
Tony Bravo
Event Description:
Experience a special night with Tony Bravo live at Pilón Miami!
All the way from
New York City
, Tony Bravo brings his signature blend of romantic ballads and timeless Latin classics to the Miami stage. Known for his soulful voice and captivating performances, Tony will fill the night with music that moves the heart. Pair his performance with Pilón Miami’s flavorful Latin fusion cuisine and handcrafted cocktails for an evening to remember.
Date:
August 30, 2025
Time:
9:00 pm
Price Per Person:
No Cover Change
Reservation

Fill out the form below and we will
contact
you as soon as possible
How to Contact Pilón Miami Restaurant
Phone

Location
12750 SW 128th St
Miami, FL 33186

Opening Hours
Mon- Thur, 12pm - 10pm
Fri & Sat, 12pm - 3am
Sunday, 12pm - 10pm
Experience Pilon Miami – A Taste of Latin Tradition
There’s nothing like experiencing
Pilon Miami
in person. From the moment you step inside, you’re welcomed by the rich aromas of authentic
Latin cuisine
, the warmth of our hospitality, and an atmosphere that blends tradition with modern charm. Whether you’re visiting for a casual meal, a special gathering, or simply exploring the
Miami culinary scene
, our restaurant invites you to immerse yourself in an unforgettable experience.
Located in the heart of
Miami
,
Pilon Miami
is more than just a restaurant—it’s a place where food brings people together. Every dish on our menu is crafted with passion and care, using fresh, high-quality ingredients to ensure every bite is full of flavor. Our chef takes inspiration from traditional Latin recipes while adding a unique touch that makes our dishes stand out.
If you are looking for an authentic dining experience?
Contact Pilón Miami
today and let us help you plan your visit! Our team is happy to assist with reservations, menu inquiries, and special event bookings.
Want to stay updated on our latest specials, seasonal dishes, and exclusive events? Follow us on social media and be the first to know about exciting promotions and insider news.
Contact Pilon Miami
to learn more about our unique offerings and what makes us a top destination for Latin cuisine in
Miami
.
So, don’t just read about us—
come and live the Pilon Miami experience!
We look forward to welcoming you and making your visit truly memorable. If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to
contact Pilon Miami
—we’re here to make your dining experience exceptional.
Phone
(305) 414-8141
Location
12750 SW 128th St
Miami, FL 33186

Coktails
House Cocktails
GINBERRY
: The sweet strawberry is balanced by lime, club soda and fresh mint for a bubbly summer strawberry drink with Brooker's Gin
PASSION MARTINI
: This is a sweet and shocking surprise, a TITOS martini and passion fruit flavors combine for a memorable mixture
MORA PA' RUMBA
: Freshly made cucumber syrup, fresh limejuice, Chambord liqueur and Brookers gin
NOSSA SENHORA
: Fresh mango juice with muddled cilantro, lime wedges,simple syrup and Tito's Vodka
EL MANGO DEL VECINO
: Lime wedge muddled with fresh mint leaves,tajin, mango juice, simple syrup and vodka
LA NETA CARNAL
: Coconut milk, fresh pineapple juice, lime juice, simple syrup, coconut rum and Mezcal Espadín joven
AY BENDITO
: Muddled basil with simple syrup, passion fruit juice, orange bitters and Jim Beam bourbon
LA CHILE-DRINA
: Homemade thyme and sweet pepper syrup, fresh lime juice, simple syrup and chipotle infused spicy tequila
classic cocktails
MARGARITA
: Available in 5 flavors, mango, passion fruit, classic, coco and strawberry
MOJITO
: Available in 5 flavors, mango, passion fruit, classic, coco and strawberry

Experience Pilon Miami – A Taste of Latin Tradition
There’s nothing like experiencing
Pilon Miami
in person. From the moment you step inside, you’re welcomed by the rich aromas of authentic
Latin cuisine
, the warmth of our hospitality, and an atmosphere that blends tradition with modern charm. Whether you’re visiting for a casual meal, a special gathering, or simply exploring the
Miami culinary scene
, our restaurant invites you to immerse yourself in an unforgettable experience.
Located in the heart of
Miami
,
Pilon Miami
is more than just a restaurant—it’s a place where food brings people together. Every dish on our menu is crafted with passion and care, using fresh, high-quality ingredients to ensure every bite is full of flavor. Our chef takes inspiration from traditional Latin recipes while adding a unique touch that makes our dishes stand out.
If you are looking for an authentic dining experience?
Contact Pilón Miami
today and let us help you plan your visit! Our team is happy to assist with reservations, menu inquiries, and special event bookings.
Want to stay updated on our latest specials, seasonal dishes, and exclusive events? Follow us on social media and be the first to know about exciting promotions and insider news.
Contact Pilon Miami
to learn more about our unique offerings and what makes us a top destination for Latin cuisine in
Miami
.
So, don’t just read about us—
come and live the Pilon Miami experience!
We look forward to welcoming you and making your visit truly memorable. If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to
contact Pilon Miami
—we’re here to make your dining experience exceptional.
